title: I'm in Love with a Stripper
description: Alena is a nanny employed by Royce a single, self-made, foul-mouthed businessman. Royce secretly has feelings for her but hides them. In order for Alena to support herself and her family she must also work as an exotic dancer by night. Everything is fine until Royce finds her out, but is she the only one with a dangerous secret?Recommended 17+ due to adult themes, harsh language, and sexual situations.
author: Michelle Marola
